channel.title: edusynth on sinneb
channel.description: Recent content in edusynth on sinneb

item.title: edusynth, successor to senk
item.description: Not out yet and already succeeded… poor Senk ;) Anyways, now presenting edusynth with an updated VCO design because the previous design had bad performance over 500hz. Also, hardsync is an option here and sounds absolutely great! Here’s the ltspice schematic: and the amplifier and output section: understandable and low part count. Nice.
